page.title: 15Employment-Winmarleigh(2)
page.content: Although neither agriculture nor other village locations provide many job opportunities there is almost an absence of{unemployment.} Farmers' daughters,and some sons,have from choice and/or necessity,found work in a variety of areas - the Law, Banking,Insurance and Finance,Design, Catering,Engineering,Clerical Work and Hairdressing. Farmers have diversified and combined running their own farms with haulage of livestock,seed and till spreading and one is a renowned livestock con- sultant. The former small holdings and workers' cottages now house{commuters}mainly to {Preston,}employed in such diverse fields as{Barrister,Building Exec., {Company Secretary,Engineering Manager, {Techers,Clerical Officers and Sevice {Industry Employees.
